item.title: my python project structure template
item.description: Cookiecutter allows you to setup a project’s structure from templates. I use a modified data science cookiecutter template, found here. The benefits of a project template are better described by others. I use one for consistent navigation across projects, and to save configuration time. My modifications to the data science template are below. I add a work directory to hold analysis results and summaries that do not belong in reports.

item.title: blog plan
item.description: Each weekend, I write up a topic I’ve explored over the past week. I then give myself another week to refine the post. Publish post histories are stored here.
